verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> appointed <S%G322><s%> seventy <S%G1440><s%> others, <S%G2087><s%> and sent <S%G649><s%> them two <S%G1417><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> ahead <S%G4253><s%> <S%G4383><s%> of Him to every <S%G3956><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> and place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> He Himself <S%G846><s%> was going <S%G3195><s%> to come. <S%G2064><s%>

And He was saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "The harvest <S%G2326><s%> is plentiful, <S%G4183><s%> but the laborers <S%G2040><s%> are few; <S%G3641><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> beseech <S%G1189><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of the harvest <S%G2326><s%> to send <S%G1544><s%> out laborers <S%G2040><s%> into His harvest. <S%G2326><s%>
"Go <S%G5217><s%> your ways; <S%G5217><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> I send <S%G649><s%> you out as lambs <S%G704><s%> in the midst <S%G3319><s%> of wolves. <S%G3074><s%>

"Carry <S%G941><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> purse, <S%G905><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> bag, <S%G4082><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> shoes; <S%G5266><s%> and greet <S%G782><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> one <S%G3367><s%> on the way. <S%G3598><s%>
"And whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> you enter, <S%G1525><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Peace <S%G1515><s%> [be] to this <S%G3778><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>'

"And if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5207><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> is there, <S%G1563><s%> your peace <S%G1515><s%> will rest <S%G1879><s%> upon him; but if <S%G1487><s%> not, it will return <S%G344><s%> to you.

"And stay <S%G3306><s%> in that house, <S%G3614><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> and drinking <S%G4095><s%> what they give <S%G3844><s%> you; for the laborer <S%G2040><s%> is worthy <S%G514><s%> of his wages. <S%G3408><s%> Do not keep moving <S%G3327><s%> from house <S%G3614><s%> to house. <S%G3614><s%>
"And whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> you enter, <S%G1525><s%> and they receive <S%G1209><s%> you, eat <S%G2068><s%> what is set <S%G3908><s%> before <S%G3908><s%> you;

and heal <S%G2323><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> in it who are sick, <S%G772><s%> and say <S%G3004><s%> to them, 'The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has come <S%G1448><s%> near <S%G1448><s%> to you.'

"But whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> you enter <S%G1525><s%> and they do not receive <S%G1209><s%> you, go <S%G1831><s%> out into its streets <S%G4116><s%> and say, <S%G3004><s%>

'Even <S%G2532><s%> the dust <S%G2868><s%> of your city <S%G4172><s%> which clings <S%G2853><s%> to our feet, <S%G4228><s%> we wipe <S%G631><s%> off <S%G631><s%> [in protest] against you; yet <S%G4133><s%> be sure <S%G1097><s%> of this, <S%G3778><s%> that the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has come <S%G1448><s%> near. <S%G1448><s%>'
"I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, it will be more <S%G414><s%> tolerable <S%G414><s%> in that day <S%G2250><s%> for Sodom, <S%G4670><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for that city. <S%G4172><s%>

"Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, Chorazin! <S%G5523><s%> Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, Bethsaida! <S%G966><s%> For if <S%G1487><s%> the miracles <S%G1411><s%> had been performed <S%G1096><s%> in Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and Sidon <S%G4605><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> occurred <S%G1096><s%> in you, they would have repented <S%G3340><s%> long <S%G3819><s%> ago, <S%G3819><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> in sackcloth <S%G4526><s%> and ashes. <S%G4700><s%>
"But it will be more <S%G414><s%> tolerable <S%G414><s%> for Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and Sidon <S%G4605><s%> in the judgment, <S%G2920><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for you.
"And you, Capernaum, <S%G2746><s%> will not be exalted <S%G5312><s%> to heaven, <S%G3772><s%> will you? You will be brought <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to Hades! <S%G86><s%>

"The one who listens <S%G191><s%> to you listens <S%G191><s%> to Me, and the one who rejects <S%G114><s%> you rejects <S%G114><s%> Me; and he who rejects <S%G114><s%> Me rejects <S%G114><s%> the One who sent <S%G649><s%> Me."

And the seventy <S%G1440><s%> returned <S%G5290><s%> with joy, <S%G5479><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the demons <S%G1140><s%> are subject <S%G5293><s%> to us in Your name. <S%G3686><s%>"
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "I was watching <S%G2334><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> lightning <S%G796><s%>.

"Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I have given <S%G1325><s%> you authority <S%G1849><s%> to tread <S%G3961><s%> upon serpents <S%G3789><s%> and scorpions, <S%G4651><s%> and over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of the enemy, <S%G2190><s%> and nothing <S%G3762><s%> shall injure <S%G91><s%> you.

"Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> do not rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in this, <S%G3778><s%> that the spirits <S%G4151><s%> are subject <S%G5293><s%> to you, but rejoice <S%G5463><s%> that your names <S%G3686><s%> are recorded <S%G1449><s%> in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>"

At that very <S%G846><s%> time <S%G5610><s%> He rejoiced <S%G21><s%> greatly <S%G21><s%> in the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "I praise <S%G1843><s%> Thee, O Father, <S%G3962><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> and earth, <S%G1093><s%> that Thou didst hide <S%G613><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> from [the] wise <S%G4680><s%> and intelligent <S%G4908><s%> and didst reveal <S%G601><s%> them to babes. <S%G3516><s%> Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> for thus <S%G3779><s%> it was well-pleasing in Thy sight. <S%G1715><s%>

"All <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> have been handed <S%G3860><s%> over <S%G3860><s%> to Me by My Father, <S%G3962><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> is except <S%G1508><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and who <S%G5101><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> is except <S%G1508><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> and anyone to whom <S%G3739><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> wills <S%G1014><s%> to reveal <S%G601><s%> [Him.]"

And turning <S%G4762><s%> to the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> privately, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> "Blessed <S%G3107><s%> [are] the eyes <S%G3788><s%> which see <S%G991><s%> the things you see, <S%G991><s%>

for I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that many <S%G4183><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> and kings <S%G935><s%> wished <S%G2309><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> you see, <S%G991><s%> and did not see <S%G3708><s%> [them,] and to hear <S%G191><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> you hear, <S%G191><s%> and did not hear <S%G191><s%> [them.] "

And behold, <S%G2400><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> lawyer <S%G3544><s%> stood <S%G450><s%> up and put <S%G1598><s%> Him to the test, <S%G1598><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall I do <S%G4160><s%> to inherit <S%G2816><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>?"
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "What <S%G5101><s%> is written <S%G1125><s%> in the Law <S%G3551><s%>? How <S%G4459><s%> does it read <S%G314><s%> to you?"

And he answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "You shall love <S%G25><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God <S%G2316><s%> with all <S%G3650><s%> your heart, <S%G2588><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your soul, <S%G5590><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your strength, <S%G2479><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your mind; <S%G1271><s%> and your neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as yourself. <S%G4572><s%>"
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "You have answered <S%G611><s%> correctly; <S%G3723><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> and you will live. <S%G2198><s%>"
But wishing <S%G2309><s%> to justify <S%G1344><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> "And who <S%G5101><s%> is my neighbor <S%G4139><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> replied <S%G5274><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "A certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G444><s%> was going <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> to Jericho; <S%G2410><s%> and he fell <S%G4045><s%> among <S%G4045><s%> robbers, <S%G3027><s%> and they stripped <S%G1562><s%> him and beat <S%G2007><s%> <S%G4127><s%> him, and went <S%G565><s%> off <S%G565><s%> leaving <S%G863><s%> him half <S%G2253><s%> dead. <S%G2253><s%>

"And by chance <S%G4795><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> priest <S%G2409><s%> was going <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> on that road, <S%G3598><s%> and when he saw <S%G3708><s%> him, he passed <S%G492><s%> by on the other <S%G492><s%> side. <S%G492><s%>

"And likewise <S%G3668><s%> a Levite <S%G3019><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> when he came <S%G2064><s%> to the place <S%G5117><s%> and saw <S%G3708><s%> him, passed <S%G492><s%> by on the other <S%G492><s%> side. <S%G492><s%>

"But a certain <S%G5100><s%> Samaritan, <S%G4541><s%> who was on a journey, <S%G3593><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> upon him; and when he saw <S%G3708><s%> him, he felt <S%G4697><s%> compassion, <S%G4697><s%>

and came <S%G4334><s%> to him, and bandaged <S%G2611><s%> up his wounds, <S%G5134><s%> pouring <S%G2022><s%> oil <S%G1637><s%> and wine <S%G3631><s%> on [them;] and he put <S%G1913><s%> him on his own <S%G2398><s%> beast, <S%G2934><s%> and brought <S%G71><s%> him to an inn, <S%G3829><s%> and took <S%G1959><s%> care <S%G1959><s%> of him.

"And on the next <S%G839><s%> day <S%G839><s%> he took <S%G1544><s%> out two <S%G1417><s%> denarii <S%G1220><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> them to the innkeeper <S%G3830><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> 'Take <S%G1959><s%> care <S%G1959><s%> of him; and whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G302><s%> more <S%G4325><s%> you spend, <S%G4325><s%> when <S%G1722><s%> I return, <S%G1880><s%> I will repay <S%G591><s%> you.'

"Which <S%G5101><s%> of these <S%G3778><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> do you think <S%G1380><s%> proved <S%G1096><s%> to be a neighbor <S%G4139><s%> to the man who fell <S%G1706><s%> into the robbers' [hands?]"

And he said, <S%G3004><s%> "The one who showed <S%G4160><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> toward <S%G3326><s%> him." And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Go <S%G4198><s%> and do <S%G4160><s%> the same. <S%G3668><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> as they were traveling <S%G4198><s%> along, He entered <S%G1525><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> village; <S%G2968><s%> and a woman <S%G1135><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Martha <S%G3136><s%> welcomed <S%G5264><s%> Him into her home. <S%G3614><s%>

And she had <S%G1510><s%> a sister <S%G79><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> moreover <S%G2532><s%> was listening <S%G191><s%> to the Lord's word, <S%G3056><s%> seated <S%G3869><s%> at His feet. <S%G4228><s%>

But Martha <S%G3136><s%> was distracted <S%G4049><s%> with all <S%G4183><s%> her preparations; <S%G1248><s%> and she came <S%G2186><s%> up [to Him,] and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> do You not care <S%G3199><s%> that my sister <S%G79><s%> has left <S%G2641><s%> me to do <S%G1247><s%> all the serving <S%G1247><s%> alone <S%G3441><s%>? Then <S%G3767><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> her to help <S%G4878><s%> me."

But the Lord <S%G2962><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Martha, <S%G3136><s%> Martha, <S%G3136><s%> you are worried <S%G3309><s%> and bothered <S%G7093><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> so many <S%G4183><s%> things; <S%G4183><s%>

but [only] a few <S%G3641><s%> things <S%G3641><s%> are necessary, <S%G5532><s%> really <S%G2228><s%> [only] one, <S%G1520><s%> for Mary <S%G3137><s%> has chosen <S%G1586><s%> the good <S%G18><s%> part, <S%G3310><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> shall not be taken <S%G851><s%> away <S%G851><s%> from her. "
